scripts.test: eslint lib/ test/ module/ && mocha -R dot test/*.js module/**/test/*.js
scripts.post-to-coveralls-io: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: browserify -s flyd lib/index.js > flyd.js && uglifyjs flyd.js -o flyd.min.js
